Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds
These are instructions for many of the specials we know about. It's under shrine topics because you need to fulfill these requirements before you can use any passwords for that breed.
  • Sp-L: I got Diva as a playable monster... November 30 - 03:15 pm

  • Sp-L: Ragnaroks! December 20 - 01:18 am

  • Sp-L: Goddess Statue Legends (Pixie and Joker) January 30 - 07:16 pm

  • Sp-L: Got my Gobi Go Go GO! January 2 - 04:53 pm

  • Sp-L: Two new Legends! (Suzurin, Mew) January 22 - 10:57 pm

  • SP-L: Thoroughbreds (Mocchi, Tiger, Arrowhead) January 24 - 06:49 am

  • Sp-U: We are the Champions!!!! special Garu Lionel December 19 - 10:25 am

  • Sp-U: White spear for Campanella December 19 - 07:20 am

  • Sp-U: Acquiring Franken December 19 - 07:26 am

  • Sp-U: Talt and Carmilla December 10 - 04:47 pm

  • Sp-U: The Gitan called Pickle December 18 - 06:49 pm

  • Sp-U: But wait, theres more!! Rainbow Doodle (spoilers) January 5 - 03:36 pm

  • Sp-U: Grasseed August 7 - 05:39 pm
